item.title: People Buy Experiences, Not Things
item.description: People Buy Experiences, Not Things [[We Are the Next Boomer Generation]]

item.title: We Are the Next Boomer Generation
item.description: We Are the Next Boomer Generation We’ve known (conventional) war our entire lives. While boomers went from trough to peak, [[Millenial Generation|Millenials]] went from peak to trough [[Gen Z]] was born into a trough with September 11, [[2008 Financial Crisis]], and [[2020 COVID Pandemic]]
